response.original_title: Tracing Our Path Through Pilsen: Artist Perspective
response.overview: Dive into the vibrant tapestry of Chicago's Pilsen community with a compelling documentary that intricately weaves together the rich threads of art, history, and culture. Renowned self-taught Chicago artist and co-founder of the Pilsen Art and Community House, Teresa Maga√±a, shares her insights alongside urban contemporary artist CZR PRZ, visionary founder of the National Museum of Mexican Art, Carlos Tortolero, and the creative mind behind Chicago Midwest Made, Mario Maldonado, among others.
response.title: Tracing Our Path Through Pilsen: Artist Perspective
